channel.title: Comments on: Discovering Rails 3 generators
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: Rails 3.0 Beta: 36 Links und Ressourcen To Get You Going « hemju – homepage erstellen und webdesign
item.dc:creator: Rails 3.0 Beta: 36 Links und Ressourcen To Get You Going « hemju – homepage erstellen und webdesign
item.description: [...] Making Generatoren für Rails 3 Mit Thor – David Trasbo veranschaulicht, wie Thor verwenden (im Wesentlichen eine bessere Rake – sorta) auf die neuen Generatoren für Rails produzieren 3 Projekte. Dies ist ein Code schwere Lösungsweg. Es gibt mehr auf Generatoren hier. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Making Generatoren für Rails 3 Mit Thor – David Trasbo veranschaulicht, wie Thor verwenden (im Wesentlichen eine bessere Rake – sorta) auf die neuen Generatoren für Rails produzieren 3 Projekte. Dies ist ein Code schwere Lösungsweg. Es gibt mehr auf Generatoren hier. […]

item.title: By: Rails 3.0 Beta - 36 Links e artigos para você começar
item.dc:creator: Rails 3.0 Beta - 36 Links e artigos para você começar
item.description: [...] Criando geradores para Rails 3 com Thor - David Trasbo mostra como usar o Thor, que é uma espécie de Rake melhorado, para criar novos geradores para projetos em Rails 3. É um tutorial com muito código e você pode ler mais sobre geradores aqui. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Criando geradores para Rails 3 com Thor – David Trasbo mostra como usar o Thor, que é uma espécie de Rake melhorado, para criar novos geradores para projetos em Rails 3. É um tutorial com muito código e você pode ler mais sobre geradores aqui. […]

item.title: By: Rails 3.0 Beta: 36 Links and Resources To Get You Going
item.dc:creator: Rails 3.0 Beta: 36 Links and Resources To Get You Going
item.description: [...] Making Generators for Rails 3 With Thor - David Trasbo demonstrates how to use Thor (essentially a better Rake - sorta) to produce new generators for Rails 3 projects. This is a code heavy walkthrough. There's more on generators here. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Making Generators for Rails 3 With Thor – David Trasbo demonstrates how to use Thor (essentially a better Rake – sorta) to produce new generators for Rails 3 projects. This is a code heavy walkthrough. There's more on generators here. […]

item.title: By: a work on process » Weekend Links – 24nd January 2010
item.dc:creator: a work on process » Weekend Links – 24nd January 2010
item.description: [...] continued to be a stream of Rails 3 focussed blog entries. José Valim has a good round up of links regarding generators in Rails 3 – it looks like they and templates (now merged) could be much more useful than they have been [...]
